item.title: New Orleans Food Review
item.description: New Orleans is, of course, a city known for its food, home to some of the best chefs in the country. I was in town recently, so I figured I’d check out some of the local establishments and give you guys a virtual sight-tasting tour. Let’s start with the hotel vending machine. Hey, I hadn’t eaten all day and I had a couple of hours to kill till my family showed up.
